title: Two Nominations Sent to the Senate – The White House
content:
Nominations & Appointments			
Issued on:
March 6, 2019
NOMINATIONS SENT TO THE SENATE:William B. Kilbride, of Tennessee, to be a Member of the Board of Directors of the Tennessee Valley Authority for a term expiring May 18, 2023, vice Eric Martin Satz, term expired.Julie Reiskin, of Colorado, to be a Member of the Board of Directors of the Legal Services Corporation for a term expiring July 13, 2019.  (Reappointment)
